stimulusHtml: Use separation of variables to find y = B(t), the particular solution to the differential equation with initial condition B(0) = 20.

features.html:
The rate at which a baby bird gains weight is proportional to the difference between its adult weight and its current weight. At time t = 0, when the bird is first weighed, its weight is 20 grams.
